message.body: hey! I know you're in LA but if you have a chance could you tell me of you're available wed 3/5 if we need more time for Ariel's shoot? I'm leaving ny thurs so we would have time to hang out and now it might become work time
I'm not :( I have to teach weds. I have to be back in philly by noon. If we didn't miss two days for snow is cancel but we are So behind
Sucks cause I don't have to work Thursday Friday!
oh that does suck. wasn't sure if your class was wed or thurs. well I'll push for us shooting on tues!
I just can't miss that much work altho I emailed them about this and no response
Try for Tuesday shoot. They might have to scale things back! It's a book trailer not a feature!
I know! funny how Charlie was like "this is of much bigger scope than I anticipated" ha me too! would like to talk to you at some point about this camera style
Definitely. Let's try to chat Tuesday or Thursday if you have time!
ok cool! have fun in LA!
